Creating Connection of R with Data Source Name
Data Source Name = MYORCL
User ID = SCDB
Password = projpassword


```{r}
#install.packages("RODBC")
#install.packages("knitr")
#install.packages("kableExtra")

library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

library(RODBC)

SC_Conn <- odbcConnect("MYORCL", 
                       uid = "SCDB", 
                       pwd= "projpassword", 
                       believeNRows=FALSE)

#sqlSave(con, test_table, "TEST_TABLE")

#close(con)

```




```{r}

CUSTOMER <- sqlQuery(SC_Conn, "select * from SCDB.CUSTOMER")

kable(CUSTOMER) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = T,font_size = 7)

```
